> 

We like to stir things up now and then by removing random content from the forum to see how people react.

I'm joking, of course :). The moderator will normally inform the poster of the reason why it was removed. You are always welcome to send one of us a PM if you disagree with one of your own posts being removed or if you would like some more information about why it happened. If it's someone else's post, though, we probably won't be able to answer because of confidentiality. 

We try and be as transparent and fair as possible, but we're only human (most of us... there's also a banana on the team) and we can make mistakes.
